Key Match Events: Fox started the surge with a short floater and assisted on a 3-pointer by Keon Ellis before DeRozan tied it on a basket with a minute left.
A goaltending call against the 76ers on Monk's driving layup gave the Kings the lead with 33.1 seconds to play.
George lost the ball and fouled Monk, who hit two free throws to make it 111-107 with 7.1 seconds left.
Post-Match Reflections: Sacramento (15-19) held the 76ers (13-18) scoreless for the final 3:30 and improved to 8-12 at home.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Joel Embiid (sprained left foot) and Kelly Oubre Jr. (sprained left hand) did not play for the Sixers, while Keegan Murray was sidelined for the Kings with left ankle soreness.
